q: A web-hosting based company wants to scale up their business and reduce maintenance cost incurred towards support team. There major requirement is to scale up on-demand and scale down as and when needed. Which cloud type suits them the best:

q: What is the minimum infrastructure required for an enterprise to move from a trivial datacenter setup to a public cloud computing setup?

In cloud computing, the ______________________ is an important factor to look for in the SaaS cloud deployment model. For this, you need to focus on how identities are federated across different components and services, and how critical data is protected from unauthorized access in the cloud.

In cloud computing, if your organization is storing, processing, and transmitting more than 300,000 credit card or transactions annually, and if you are moving to cloud, you need to make sure that your cloud service provider must be ______________________ compliant.

a.option: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA)
Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS)

q: An IT company wants to switch to a model that will allow them to have complete control over networking nodes and firewalls without the hassle of provisioning new VMs and hardware. Which of the following models of cloud computing should they choose?

In cloud computing, if your organization is looking forward to move some of its IT budget from capital expenditure to operational expenditure, your best option would be __________________________________.

In cloud computing, to ensure _________________________, you should check for encryption related facilities, data ownership related norms of the vendor, backup archival and purging mechanisms, and if required, physical location of the data center storing your data.
In cloud computing, which of the following technologies is the best in terms of cost and time for a hassle-free, geographically-redundant, and on-demand storage needs?

a.option: Manual daily backups at each location

q: In cloud computing, an important part of cloud migration planning is ________________________. In this, you should have plan for a rollback, and be aware about steps for moving all your applications back to original state, or to some other cloud service

A company ABC needs a data center with 1000 servers at a minimum cost of maintenance. Servers should be available 24 hours per day and redundancy is the key. Which of the following is used to achieve this requirement at the cheapest possible cost?

a.option: Hiring a third party company to manage data centers
Setting up servers in a cloud-ready data center

q: In cloud computing, which of the following models enables end-to-end communication?
